2025-10-16.content:
**vLLM TPU**

[vLLM TPU](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/open-models/vllm/use-vllm-tpu), a
highly-efficient serving framework for large language models (LLM) that's
optimized for [Cloud TPU](https://cloud.google.com/tpu) hardware, is available through
Model Garden.

2025-10-14.content:
**Imagen 4 preview models**

The following Imagen 4 preview models will be removed on
November 30, 2025 :
`imagen-4.0-generate-preview-06-06`,
`imagen-4.0-ultra-generate-preview-06-06`, and
`imagen-4.0-fast-generate-preview-06-06`. To avoid service
disruption, migrate all workflows that use Imagen 4 preview models before
November 30, 2025 , 2025, to the following Imagen 4 Generally
Available models: `imagen-4.0-generate-001`,
`imagen-4.0-ultra-generate-001`,
`imagen-4.0-fast-generate-001`.

summary.title: Imagen 4 preview models removal

2025-10-02.content:
**[Gemini 2.5 Flash Image](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/models/gemini/2-5-flash#image-generation)** (`gemini-2.5-flash-image`) is now generally available. This GA release adds support for aspect ratio controls, image-only response modality, regional endpoints, [support for batch predictions](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/multimodal/batch-prediction-gemini), [image generation from multiple reference images](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/multimodal/image-generation#image-generation), and [improved multi-turn image editing](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/multimodal/image-editing#multi-turn-editing).

See [Gemini 2.5 Flash Image](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/models/gemini/2-5-flash#image) for more information.

summary.title: Gemini 2.5 Flash Image is Now Generally Available
summary.summary: Gemini 2.5 Flash Image has reached general availability, introducing new features like aspect ratio controls, image-only responses, regional endpoints, batch prediction support, multi-reference image generation, and enhanced multi-turn image editing.

2025-10-02.content:
**Google Gen AI SDK in C# Preview**

[Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages): The Google Gen AI SDK is available in C#. See [googleapis/dotnet-genai](https://github.com/googleapis/dotnet-genai).

This release includes support for `GenerateContentAsync`, `GenerateContentStreamAsync`, `GenerateImagesAsync`, and three Live APIs, which includes `SendClientContentAsync`, `SendRealtimeInputAsync`, and `SendToolResponseAsync`.

summary.title: Google Gen AI SDK in C# Preview
summary.summary: The Google Gen AI SDK is now available in C# as a preview. This SDK supports various content generation and real-time interaction features.

summary.summary: Access to Gemini 1.5 models has been discontinued. Please refer to the Model versions page for more information.

2025-09-23.content:
**Gemini 2.5 Flash with Live API Native Audio Preview**

[**Gemini 2.5 Flash with Live API Native Audio**](cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/models/gemini/2-5-flash) (`gemini-live-2.5-flash-preview-native-audio-09-2025`) is available in [Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages). A single, unified model processes audio input and generates audio output directly, eliminating separate text-to-speech/speech-to-text conversions. This results in-low latency, high-quality, and incredibly human-like conversations. New features and capabilities include:

* **Improved Barge-in:** Interrupt Gemini more naturally and reliably, even in loud and noisy environments.
* **Robust Function Calling:** We've improved the triggering rate, allowing Gemini to successfully execute the functions you define with greater precision.
* **Accurate Transcription:** The accuracy of audio-to-text transcription has been significantly enhanced.
* **Seamless Multilingual Support:** Speak to Gemini in multiple languages, and it will effortlessly switch between them without any pre-configuration. Language is no longer a barrier!
* **Enhanced Audio Quality:** Experience a dramatically improved audio quality that truly feels like speaking with a person.
* **Proactive Audio:** Define Gemini's expertise and set conditions for when it should respond. Gemini can act as a "silent listener," only chiming in when the conversation touches upon its designated area of expertise.
* **Affective Dialog:** Gemini can adapt and adjust its generated voice to match the emotional tone of the speaker, creating more empathetic and natural interactions.

[Watch our comprehensive demo](https://youtu.be/ZsB33Tr-P3c) to see these features in action, including seamless language switching, expert mode, emotionally aware responses, memory recall, and interactive screen sharing for engineering tasks â€“ all demonstrated directly within Vertex AI Studio without writing a single line of code!

summary.title: Gemini 2.5 Flash: Real-time Audio Conversations
summary.summary: Gemini 2.5 Flash now supports native audio processing for low-latency, human-like conversations. Key features include improved barge-in, robust function calling, accurate transcription, seamless multilingual support, enhanced audio quality, proactive audio responses, and affective dialog for emotionally resonant interactions.

summary.title: DeepSeek-V3.1-Terminus Now Available
summary.summary: The new DeepSeek-V3.1-Terminus model is now accessible via Model Garden.

2025-09-18.content:
**Grounding with Google Maps**

Grounding with Google Maps has implemented the following changes:

* Removed the following fields from the API response:
  + `grounding_chunk.maps.text`
  + `grounding_chunk.maps.place_answer_sources.review_snippets.author_attribution`
  + `grounding_chunk.maps.place_answer_sources.flag_content_uri`
  + `grounding_chunk.maps.place_answer_sources.review_snippets.flag_content_uri`
* The widget context token is only returned when the optional `widget_token_enable` input flag is set.

To learn more, see [Grounding with Google Maps](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/grounding/grounding-with-google-maps).

summary.title: Google Maps Grounding Update
summary.summary: The Google Maps grounding feature has been updated. Several fields have been removed from the API response, and the widget context token is now only returned when the `widget_token_enable` flag is set.

2025-09-15.content:
**Imagen**

We improved Imagen's virtual try-on model, `virtual-try-on-preview-08-04`, so that it is better at preserving the person's body shape and preserving the garment product's identity.

summary.title: Imagen model update
summary.summary: The Imagen virtual try-on model has been updated to better preserve body shape and garment identity.

2025-10-03.content:
**Prompt management**

Vertex AI offers tooling to help manage prompts and prompt versions. In addition to the prompt management capabilities in Vertex AI Studio, prompts can be stored and versioned using the Vertex AI SDK.

For more information, see the [Prompt management](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/model-reference/prompt-classes) API reference.

summary.title: Prompt Management
summary.summary: Manage your prompts and their versions with Vertex AI tooling.

2025-09-10.content:
**Vertex AI Agent Engine**

Agent Engine now supports the following features:

* Agent Engine **Code Execution**, now in Preview, lets your agent run code in an isolated sandbox environment. For more information, see [Code Execution](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/agent-engine/code-execution/overview).
* You can now develop, deploy, and use agents that support the **Agent-to-Agent (A2A) protocol** on Agent Engine. For more information, see [Develop an Agent2Agent agent](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/agent-engine/develop/a2a).
* Agent Engine now supports **bidirectional streaming**. For more information, see [Bidirectional streaming](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/agent-engine/bidirectional-streaming).
* The [Agent Engine page](https://console.cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/agents/agent-engines) in the Cloud Console UI now has a new **Memory Bank** tab for displaying and managing memories.

summary.title: New Features for Vertex AI Agent Engine
summary.summary: Vertex AI Agent Engine introduces exciting new capabilities including Code Execution for running code in a sandbox, support for the Agent-to-Agent (A2A) protocol, and bidirectional streaming. Additionally, a new Memory Bank tab is now available in the Cloud Console for managing agent memories.

2025-09-10.content:
**Vertex AI Agent Engine**

In version `v1.112.0` of the Vertex AI SDK for Python, the `agent_engines` module has been refactored to a [client-based design](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/agent-engine/overview#migration). For information about updating your existing code to the new design, see the [Migration guide](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/deprecations/agent-engine-migration).

summary.title: Vertex AI Agent Engine Update
summary.summary: The Vertex AI SDK for Python has refactored its agent_engines module to a client-based design in version v1.112.0. A migration guide is available for updating existing code.

For more information, see [Vertex AI RAG Engine billing](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/rag-engine/rag-engine-billing).

**Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Preview**

[Gemini 2.5 Flash Image](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/models/gemini/2-5-flash#image-generation) (`gemini-2.5-flash-image-preview`) is available in [Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages). Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Preview supports additional image generation and editing features such as [image generation from multiple reference images](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/multimodal/image-generation#image-generation) and [improved multi-turn image editing](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/multimodal/image-editing#multi-turn-editing).

2025-08-26.content:
**Vertex AI model tuning and Gen AI evaluation service**

Vertex AI model tuning now supports integration with the Gen AI evaluation service in Preview. You can automatically run evaluations on your tuned models and intermediate checkpoints. For more information, see [Create a tuning job](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/models/gemini-use-supervised-tuning#create_a_text_model_supervised_tuning_job).

summary.title: Vertex AI Model Tuning and Gen AI Evaluation
summary.summary: New integration allows automatic evaluations of tuned models and checkpoints in Vertex AI.

2025-08-21.content:
**Vertex AI Agent Engine**

Agent Engine now supports the following enterprise security features:

* You can now deploy your agents in a private VPC environment, configuring a Private Service Connect interface, to ensure data privacy and meet security and compliance requirements. For more information, see [Configure Private Service Connect interface](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/agent-engine/deploy#psc-i).
* You can now use your own [customer-managed encryption keys (CMEK)](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/agent-engine/manage/access#cmek) to protect data at rest.
* You can now specify [customized resource controls](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/agent-engine/deploy#customized-resource-controls), such as the minimum and maximum number of application instances, resource limits for each container, and concurrency for each container.
* As a part of Vertex AI Platform, Vertex AI Agent Engine now supports [HIPAA](https://cloud.google.com/security/compliance/hipaa) workloads.

For more information, see [Agent Engine overview](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/agent-engine/overview#enterprise_security).

summary.title: Vertex AI Agent Engine Enhances Enterprise Security
summary.summary: Introducing enhanced security for Vertex AI Agent Engine, now with private VPC deployment, customer-managed encryption keys, and customized resource controls. Additionally, it now supports HIPAA workloads as part of the Vertex AI Platform.

2025-08-06.content:
**Imagen**

Virtual try-on lets you generate virtual try-on images from an image of a
person and product photos that you provide, and is available in Preview. For more information, see [Generate Virtual Try-On Images](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/image/generate-virtual-try-on-images) and [Virtual Try-On API](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/model-reference/virtual-try-on-api).

summary.title: Imagen Virtual Try-On
summary.summary: Virtual try-on feature.

2025-07-29.content: **Veo video generation** Veo 3 and Veo 3 Fast are now generally available. For more information, see [Generate videos using text prompts](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/video/generate-videos-from-text).

summary.title: Veo video generation now available
summary.summary: Veo 3 and Veo 3 Fast are now available.

2025-07-23.content: [Grounding with Google Maps](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/grounding/grounding-with-google-maps) is available in all regions (except for the EEA) as a Preview (Pre-GA) feature.

summary.title: Grounding with Google Maps Now in Preview
summary.summary: Grounding with Google Maps is now available in all regions (except EEA) as a Preview feature.

2025-07-22.content:
**Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite** is now generally available and accessible using the API and Vertex AI Studio. This GA release includes support for explicit caching and [batch prediction](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/multimodal/batch-prediction-gemini), as well as expanded region support.

See [Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/models/gemini/2-5-flash-lite) for more information.

summary.title: Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite Now Generally Available
summary.summary: Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite is now generally available via API and Vertex AI Studio, featuring explicit caching, batch prediction, and expanded region support.

2025-07-17.content: **Veo 3** preview models now support upscaling for 1080p resolution using the new `resolution` parameter. For more information, see [Veo on Vertex AI](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/model-reference/veo-video-generation#resolution).

summary.title: Veo 3 now supports 1080p upscaling
summary.summary: You can now upscale videos to 1080p using the new 'resolution' parameter in Veo 3 preview models. This feature enhances video quality for a better viewing experience.

2025-07-16.content: Added [Gemma 3](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-samples/blob/main/notebooks/community/model_garden/model_garden_axolotl_gemma3_finetuning.ipynb) fine-tuning notebook using Axolotl docker with support for 1b, 4b, 12b, and 27b variants.

summary.title: New Gemma 3 Fine-tuning Notebook Released
summary.summary: We have released a new fine-tuning notebook for Gemma 3. This notebook supports 1b, 4b, 12b, and 27b variants and uses the Axolotl docker.

2025-07-14.content: [Multimodal MedGemma 27B IT](https://console.cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/publishers/google/model-garden/medgemma;publisherModelVersion=medgemma-27b-it), [MedSigLIP](https://console.cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/publishers/google/model-garden/medsiglip), and [T5Gemma](https://console.cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/publishers/google/model-garden/t5gemma) models are available through Model Garden.

summary.title: New medical AI models available in Model Garden
summary.summary: The latest advancements in medical AI are now accessible via Model Garden, featuring MedGemma 27B IT for multimodal medical understanding, MedSigLIP for medical image analysis, and T5Gemma for text generation tasks.

2025-07-08.content:
**Vertex AI Agent Engine**

[Vertex AI Agent Engine Memory Bank](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/agent-engine/memory-bank/overview) is now available in Preview. Memory Bank lets you dynamically generate long-term memories based on users' conversations with your agent.

summary.title: Vertex AI Agent Engine Memory Bank now in Preview
summary.summary: Memory Bank for Vertex AI Agent Engine is now available in Preview. This feature allows for dynamic generation of long-term memories from user conversations with your agent.

2025-07-03.content:
**Vertex AI Agent Garden**

[Vertex AI Agent Garden](https://console.cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/agents/agent-garden) now supports filtering by tags.

summary.title: Filter by tags in Vertex AI Agent Garden
summary.summary: You can now filter by tags in Vertex AI Agent Garden.

2025-06-27.content: [Gemma 3n](https://console.cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/publishers/google/model-garden/gemma3n) models are now available through Model Garden.

summary.title: Gemma 3n Models Now Available
summary.summary: The new Gemma 3n models are now accessible via Model Garden, offering advanced capabilities for various applications.

2025-06-27.content: Multimodal datasets are now available in preview. For more information, see [Multimodal datasets](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/multimodal/datasets).

summary.title: New feature: Multimodal datasets are available in preview
summary.summary: Preview of multimodal datasets is now available. You can find more information in the documentation regarding multimodal datasets.

2025-06-24.content:
Starting on June 24, 2025, Imagen versions 1 and 2, image captioning, and visual question answering are deprecated.

On September 24, 2025, the following features and models will be removed:

* image captioning
* visual question answering
* Imagen 1 model `imagegeneration@002`
* Imagen 2 models `imagegeneration@005` and `imagegeneration@006`

For more information, see [Migrate to Imagen 3](vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/image/migrate-to-imagen-3).

summary.title: Imagen versions 1 and 2 deprecated
summary.summary: Imagen versions 1 and 2, image captioning, and visual question answering are deprecated starting June 24, 2025. These features will be removed on September 24, 2025. Please migrate to Imagen 3.

2025-06-23.content: **Veo 2** support for advanced video controls is Generally Available. In addition to a providing a first frame of a video, you can specify the last frame of a video or a video to extend in length. For more information, see [Veo on Vertex AI API](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/model-reference/veo-video-generation).

summary.title: Veo 2 Advanced Video Controls Now Available
summary.summary: You can now use advanced video controls for Veo 2, including specifying the first and last frames, or extending video length. Learn more about Veo on Vertex AI API.

2025-06-17.content:
**Gemini 2.5 Flash** and **Gemini 2.5 Pro** are now generally available and accessible using the API and Vertex AI Studio.

See [Gemini 2.5 Flash](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/models/gemini/2-5-flash) and [Gemini 2.5 Pro](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/models/gemini/2-5-pro) for more information.

summary.title: Gemini 2.5 Models Now Generally Available
summary.summary: Gemini 2.5 Flash and Gemini 2.5 Pro are now available via API and Vertex AI Studio.

2025-06-17.content:
**Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite** is now available as a preview offering in both the API and Vertex AI Studio.

See [Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/models/gemini/2-5-flash-lite) for more information.

summary.title: Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite now in preview
summary.summary: Gemini 2.5 Flash-Lite is now available as a preview in the API and Vertex AI Studio. You can find more details on the Vertex AI website.

2025-06-17.content:
**Live API** is now available as a private general availability offering in the API and Vertex AI Studio. Reach out to your Google account team representative to request access.

See [Live API](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/live-api) for more information.

summary.title: Live API now available
summary.summary: Live API is now available as a private general availability offering in the API and Vertex AI Studio. Contact your Google account team to request access.

2025-06-17.content:
**Preview endpoint availability and removal:** All existing Gemini 2.5 Flash and Pro preview endpoints (listed below) will continue to be available with their current preview pricing until July 15, 2025. After this date, these preview endpoints will be shut down.

* `gemini-2.5-flash-preview-04-17`
* `gemini-2.5-flash-preview-05-20`
* `gemini-2.5-pro-preview-03-25`
* `gemini-2.5-pro-preview-05-06`
* `gemini-2.5-pro-preview-06-05`

summary.title: Gemini 2.5 preview endpoints to be shut down after July 15, 2025
summary.summary: All existing Gemini 2.5 Flash and Pro preview endpoints will be shut down after July 15, 2025. Until then, they will remain available with current preview pricing.

2025-06-17.content: **Updated pricing for Gemini 2.5 Flash GA:** The price for Gemini 2.5 Flash in GA will be adjusted to reflect its quality and unified output token pricing. This includes lower prices for thinking output, higher prices for non-thinking output. These pricing changes will take effect on the new GA endpoint as shared above. Preview pricing will only continue on existing preview endpoints for 30 days post-GA on **July 15, 2025**.

summary.title: Gemini 2.5 Flash Pricing Update
summary.summary: Pricing for Gemini 2.5 Flash has been updated. This change affects output token pricing, with lower rates for thinking output and higher rates for non-thinking output. These new prices apply to the GA endpoint starting July 15, 2025. Existing preview endpoints will maintain preview pricing for 30 days after the GA launch.

2025-06-17.content: **Provisioned Throughput (PT):** Once a model is GA, all new PT purchases will be for GA endpoints only. If you've purchased PT for a specific preview version, it will still work for that specific preview. However, you must [migrate the existing PT to the GA endpoint](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/provisioned-throughput/purchase-provisioned-throughput#change-order) or purchase new PT for the GA endpoint by **July 15, 2025**.

summary.title: Provisioned Throughput Update
summary.summary: Provisioned throughput for models that have reached general availability (GA) will be for GA endpoints exclusively. Existing provisioned throughput purchases for preview versions will remain functional for their specific preview versions. However, a migration of existing provisioned throughput to the GA endpoint or a new purchase for the GA endpoint is required by July 15, 2025.

2025-06-17.content: **Updated preview endpoints:** Effective **June 19, 2025**, `gemini-2.5-flash-preview-04-17` endpoint will serve the Gemini 2.5 Flash model version released on 05-20, which has been promoted to GA. Similarly, the `gemini-2.5-pro-preview-05-06` and `03-25` endpoints will serve the Gemini 2.5 Pro model version released on 06-05, also promoted to GA. This update ensures continuity during your transition.

summary.title: Gemini Model Updates to General Availability
summary.summary: The Gemini 2.5 Flash and Pro models have been updated to their General Availability (GA) versions. The preview endpoints will now serve the GA model versions, ensuring a smooth transition for users.

2025-06-16.content: The DeepSeek API service on Vertex AI is in [Preview](https://cloud.google.com/products#product-launch-stages). For more information, see the [DeepSeek model card](https://console.cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/publishers/deepseek-ai/model-garden/deepseek-r1-0528-maas) in Model Garden.

summary.title: DeepSeek API now in Preview on Vertex AI Preview
summary.summary: The DeepSeek API is now available on Vertex AI as a preview feature. You can find more details about the DeepSeek model in Model Garden.

2025-06-11.content:
**Imagen 4**'s public preview models are updated to the following:

* `imagen-4.0-generate-preview-06-06`
* `imagen-4.0-fast-generate-preview-06-06`
* `imagen-4.0-ultra-generate-preview-06-06`

For more information about each model, see [Preview Imagen models](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/models#preview-imagen-models).

To avoid service interruption, migrate from `imagen-4.0-ultra-generate-exp-05-20` and `imagen-4.0-generate-preview-05-20` before 2025-07-07.

summary.title: Imagen 4 Public Preview Models Updated
summary.summary: The Imagen 4 public preview models have been updated. To prevent service disruptions, please migrate from the older `imagen-4.0-ultra-generate-exp-05-20` and `imagen-4.0-generate-preview-05-20` models before July 7, 2025.

2025-06-09.content:
**Gemini API**

The `logprobs` and `response_logprobs` parameters for the Gemini API are now [generally available](https://cloud.google.com/products?e=13802955&hl=en#product-launch-stages). For more information, see [Generate content with Gemini API](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/model-reference/inference#logprobs).

summary.title: Gemini API logprobs now generally available
summary.summary: The Gemini API now offers generally available logprobs and response_logprobs parameters, enhancing content generation capabilities.

2025-06-05.content:
**Gemini 2.5 Pro**'s public preview version has been updated to `gemini-2.5-pro-preview-06-05` and includes expanded support for thinking. This model version is available in the API and Vertex AI Studio.

See [Gemini 2.5 Pro](https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/models/gemini/2-5-pro) for model details.

summary.title: Gemini 2.5 Pro Update
summary.summary: The public preview of Gemini 2.5 Pro has been updated to a new version, gemini-2.5-pro-preview-06-05. This update enhances reasoning capabilities and is accessible via the API and Vertex AI Studio.

summary.title: New Model Variants in Model Garden
summary.summary: DeepSeek-R1-0528 model variants are now available in Model Garden.

2025-06-03.content:
In Model Garden, the following fine tuning features have been added:

* [Gemma 3](https://console.cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/publishers/google/model-garden/gemma3) UI fine-tuning using PEFT docker.
* [Qwen 2.5](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-samples/blob/main/notebooks/community/model_garden/model_garden_pytorch_qwen2_5_finetuning.ipynb) fine-tuning notebook using PEFT docker.
* [Qwen 3](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-samples/blob/main/notebooks/community/model_garden/model_garden_axolotl_qwen3_finetuning.ipynb) fine-tuning notebook using Axolotl docker.
* lm-evaluation-harness as an evaluation service in the [Llama 3.3](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-samples/blob/main/notebooks/community/model_garden/model_garden_pytorch_llama3_3_finetuning.ipynb), [Llama 3.1](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-samples/blob/main/notebooks/community/model_garden/model_garden_pytorch_llama3_1_finetuning.ipynb), [Gemma 3](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-samples/blob/main/notebooks/community/model_garden/model_garden_gemma3_finetuning_on_vertex.ipynb) and [Gemma 2](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/vertex-ai-samples/blob/main/notebooks/community/model_garden/model_garden_gemma2_finetuning_on_vertex.ipynb) fine-tuning notebooks.

summary.title: New Fine-Tuning Features in Model Garden
summary.summary: Model Garden has introduced new fine-tuning capabilities for several models, including Gemma 3, Qwen 2.5, and Qwen 3, with support for PEFT and Axolotl docker containers. Additionally, lm-evaluation-harness has been integrated as an evaluation service for Llama 3.3, Llama 3.1, Gemma 3, and Gemma 2 fine-tuning notebooks.
